summary: Replaces the regular male body texture with the iconic Conan warpaint.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Conan the Barbarian Warpaint
Version: 1.0
Date: 12/16/2011
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): kilo82

Description
===========
Replaces the regular male body texture with the iconic Conan warpaint. Also contains a separate face texture.

Works well with \"True Barbarian Armor\" by rahman530 (as seen in shot #2)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3556

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy the \"textures\" folder to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
3. Done

Uninstall
=========

Delete the following files:

...\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\male\\malebody_1.dds
...\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Character assets\\tintmasks\\maleheadwarpaint_10.dds

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
The game uses the same body texture for all male PCs and NPCs so if you install this Mod even lowly NPCs will go all Thulsa Doom on their daily chores. 

History
=======

1.0, 2011/12/16 - Initial release.

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
author: kilo82
